name: Namara-chan's Great Adventure (Demo)
description:
• Arrow keys to move
  • Z/Enter/Mouse click to interact
  • X to Cancel

2023-03-09

Happy Miku Day!

I decided to release a demo of my work-in-progress Snow Miku game to celebrate this day.

This project is taking waaay longer than I expected to finish it. I postponed my planned release date multiples times already. This time I wanted to finish it before the winter ends but I'm definitely not gonna make it. At this point, I have no idea how long it will take me to finish this project.

Anyways, I cobbled this up in a rush for Miku Day just so I could get something out there. Enjoy!

Links for Japanese version:

https://touji.itch.io/namara-chan-demo-jp

https://game.nicovideo.jp/atsumaru/games/gm29343
